docs/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | BOOSE docs
docs/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Represents a drawable canvas that provides methods for drawing shapes, lines, and text. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppCanvas class with the specified dimensions. public AppCanvas(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the canvas in pixels. Must be a positive integer. height int The height of the canvas in pixels. Must be a positive integer. Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when width or height is not a positive integer. Properties PenColour Gets or sets the color of the pen used for drawing. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when the value is not of type Color. Xpos Gets or sets the X-coordinate position. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the Y-coordinate position. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle on the canvas at the current position. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int The radius of the circle. Must be a positive integer. filled bool A boolean value indicating whether the circle should be filled. If true, the circle is filled; otherwise, it is not. Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when radius is not a positive integer. Clear() Clears the canvas by filling it with a white color. public void Clear() Remarks This method is implemented, but currently does not work due to BOOSE restrictions. DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current position to the specified coordinates on the canvas. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The x-coordinate of the endpoint of the line. y int The y-coordinate of the endpoint of the line. MoveTo(int, int) Moves the pen to the specified coordinates. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The new x-coordinate to move the pen to. y int The new y-coordinate to move the pen to. Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle on the canvas at the current position. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int The width of the rectangle in pixels. Must be a positive integer. height int The height of the rectangle in pixels. Must be a positive integer. filled bool A boolean value indicating whether the rectangle should be filled. If true, the rectangle is filled; otherwise, it is not. Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when width or height is not a positive integer. Reset() Resets the position coordinates to their initial values and reinitializes the pen, with the default colour of Black. public void Reset() Remarks This method is implemented, but currently does not work due to BOOSE restrictions. Set(int, int) Sets the dimensions of the canvas and initializes a new bitmap and graphics context. public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the canvas in pixels. Must be a positive integer. height int The height of the canvas in pixels. Must be a positive integer. Remarks This method is implemented, but currently does not work due to BOOSE restrictions. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the color of the pen using the specified RGB values. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int The red component of the color. Must be between 0 and 255. green int The green component of the color. Must be between 0 and 255. blue int The blue component of the color. Must be between 0 and 255. Tri(int, int) Draw a triangle on the canvas at the current position. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the triangle in pixels. Must be a positive integer. height int The height of the triangle in pixels. Must be a positive integer. Remarks This method is implemented, but currently does not work due to BOOSE restrictions. Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when width or height is not a positive integer. WriteText(string) Writes text on the canvas at the current position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string The text to be written. Remarks This method is implemented, but currently does not work due to BOOSE restrictions. Exceptions ArgumentException Thrown when text is null or empty. getBitmap() Retrieves the current bitmap from the canvas. public object getBitmap() Returns object An object representing the current bitmap on the canvas. Remarks This method is implemented, but currently does not work due to BOOSE restrictions.

docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedCircle.html.title: Class UnrestrictedCircle | BOOSE docs
docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedCircle.html.summary: Class UnrestrictedCircle Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Represents the UnrestrictedCircle command which draws a circle on the canvas. Importantly, this command does not restrict the radius parameter. public class UnrestrictedCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter UnrestrictedCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors UnrestrictedCircle() Initializes a new instance of the UnrestrictedCircle class. public UnrestrictedCircle() UnrestrictedCircle(Canvas, int, bool) Initializes a new instance of the UnrestrictedCircle class with the specified canvas, radius, and filled status. public UnrestrictedCircle(Canvas c, int radius, bool filled) Parameters c Canvas The canvas on which the circle will be drawn. radius int The radius of the circle to be drawn, must be a positive integer. filled bool A boolean indicating whether the circle should be filled (currently not implemented). Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Overrides the CheckParameters method to validate the parameters for the UnrestrictedCircle command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] Exceptions CommandException Throws an ArgumentException if there are more than or less than 1 parameter. Execute() Executes the command. public override void Execute() Exceptions Exception Throws an exception if there is an error during execution.

docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedCommandFactory.title: Class UnrestrictedCommandFactory | BOOSE docs
docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedCommandFactory.summary: Class UnrestrictedCommandFactory Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Overrides the CommandFactory to provide unrestricted versions of commands. public class UnrestrictedCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory UnrestrictedCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MakeCommand(string) Overrides the MakeCommand method to return unrestricted command instances. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string commandType) Parameters commandType string The inputted command. Returns ICommand Returns unrestricted command instances, unless it has not been implemented yet, in that case, it returns the original command. Exceptions Exception Thrown when there is an error creating the command, such as when the command does not exist or is misspelt.

docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedDrawTo.html.title: Class UnrestrictedDrawTo | BOOSE docs
docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedDrawTo.html.summary: Class UnrestrictedDrawTo Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Represents the UnrestrictedDrawTo command which draws a line from the current position to a specified (x, y) coordinate on the canvas without any restrictions. public class UnrestrictedDrawTo : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters UnrestrictedDrawTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors UnrestrictedDrawTo() Initializes a new instance of the UnrestrictedDrawTo class. public UnrestrictedDrawTo() UnrestrictedDrawTo(Canvas, int, int) Initalizes a new instance of the UnrestrictedDrawTo class with the specified canvas and (x, y) coordinates. public UnrestrictedDrawTo(Canvas c, int x, int y) Parameters c Canvas The canvas on which the cursor will be moved. x int The x-coordinates. y int The y-coordinates. Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Overrides the CheckParameters method to validate the parameters for the UnrestrictedDrawTo command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] Exceptions CommandException Throws an ArgumentException if there are more than or less than 2 parameters. Execute() Executes the command. Also moves the cursor to the new position after drawing. public override void Execute() Exceptions Exception Throws an exception if there is an error during execution.

docs/BOOSEapp.UnrestrictedRect.html.summary: Class UnrestrictedRect Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll Represents the UnrestrictedRect command which draws a rectangle on the canvas. This command does not restrict the width and height parameters. public class UnrestrictedRect : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter UnrestrictedRect Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors UnrestrictedRect() Initializes a new instance of the UnrestrictedRect class. public UnrestrictedRect() UnrestrictedRect(Canvas, int, int, bool) Initializes a new instance of the UnrestrictedRect class with the specified canvas, width, height, and filled status. public UnrestrictedRect(Canvas c, int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters c Canvas The canvas on which the rectangle will be drawn. width int The width of the rectangle, must be a positive integer. height int The height of the rectangle, must be a positive integer. filled bool A boolean indicating whether the rectangle should be filled (currently not implemented). Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Overrides the CheckParameters method to validate the parameters for the UnrestrictedRect command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] Exceptions CommandException Throws an ArgumentException if there are not enough parameters. docs/BOOSEapp.html.title: Namespace BOOSEapp | BOOSE docs
docs/BOOSEapp.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEapp Classes AppCanvas Represents a drawable canvas that provides methods for drawing shapes, lines, and text. BOOSEForm Represents the main form for the BOOSE application, providing a user interface to run BOOSE programs and display the output on a canvas. UnrestrictedCircle Represents the UnrestrictedCircle command which draws a circle on the canvas. Importantly, this command does not restrict the radius parameter. UnrestrictedCommandFactory Overrides the CommandFactory to provide unrestricted versions of commands. UnrestrictedDrawTo Represents the UnrestrictedDrawTo command which draws a line from the current position to a specified (x, y) coordinate on the canvas without any restrictions. UnrestrictedMoveTo Represents the UnrestrictedMoveTo command which moves the drawing cursor to a specified (x, y) coordinate on the canvas without any restrictions. UnrestrictedRect Represents the UnrestrictedRect command which draws a rectangle on the canvas. This command does not restrict the width and height parameters.

index.html.title: This is the HOMEPAGE. | BOOSE docs
